title: Lovely 4-bedroom House in Silverado Ranch w/Upgrades & S/S Appliances
posting_body: ['Charming 2-story house for rent off of St.Rose Pkwy in Henderson.', 'Quick drive to the M Resort, shopping, schools and freeway access.', 'Over 1,700 sfqt with 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms and a 2-car garage.', 'Traditional layout with separate formal living and family rooms featuring plush carpeting, 2-tone colors, plantation shutters and ceiling fans.', 'Beautiful gourmet kitchen with island, upgraded cabinets, granite countertops and S/S appliances.', 'Upstairs laundry room with washer/dryer.', 'All 4 bedrooms are upstairs and feature plush carpeting and ceiling fans.', 'Master bedroom with walk-in closet.', 'Dual vanity with shower and bathtub in master bathroom.', 'Guest bedrooms share a full bath with tub/shower combo and feature a front-facing balcony.', 'Cozy backyard with desert landscaping.', '1-year lease minimum.', 'NO PETS please.', 'Available 8.1.2022', 'Rent: $1,975/mo', 'Security deposit: $1,975', 'Key deposit: $100', 'Cleaning fee: $400', 'App.fee: $75/person  (Owner wants solid references and good credit 600+ FICO score)', 'Tel:', 'show contact info', "(Please leave a DETAILED message if I don't answer.", 'Thank you)', 'Showings available Mo-Sat 9am to 6pm by appointment.', 'Henderson - Green Valley - Anthem area buyer/leasing specialist', 'American Realty and Property Management', 'Keyword: Amigo - Henderson 89052']
